::: Transanulas curses ::: Damn that Ram! No matter, im almost-

::: He falls as he takes a shot in the shoulder ::: By the pit!

::: He then grabs Darkmouse by the ankle, and drags her over rocks and thorns 
as he makes his way to the ship. Now, within the entry, he turns, raises his 
gun, and takes five clean shots at the ram as Mechfluid runs down his arm. 
First, he thought, he needs to secure the mouse and then get into a CR tank. 
:::
